title: Alex Rodriguez Closes In On 660 Homerun Record Set By Willie Mays
teaser: NPR's Melissa Block talks with Mark Feinsand, Yankees beat writer with the New York Daily News, about Alex Rodriguez's game this year and how he is expected to surpass Willie Mays' 660 homerun record.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
